title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5325.5 - Signage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5325.5 - Signage

State Regulations

Each gaming facility licensee shall post signs in a size
as approved in writing by the commission that include the problem gambling
assistance message as set forth in section ยง
5325.6
of this Part at each of the
following locations: (a) within 50
feet of each entrance and exit of the gaming facility or at a distance
otherwise approved in writing by the commission; (b) above or below the cash-dispensing
opening on all automated teller machines, automated gaming voucher and coupon
redemption machines and other machines that dispense cash to patrons at the
gaming facility; (c) on all gaming
devices; (d) in all gaming facility
employee break areas; (e) in the
player club location or locations; (f) in or near cage areas; and
(g) in any other location, as the commission
may require. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5325.5

Adopted

New

York State Register June 8, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 23, eff. 6/8/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
